Key Match Events: Tanzim Sakib picked 3 wickets in a sensational spell of fast bowling
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzim Sakib acknowledged the incredible support for their team during their T20 World Cup 2024 match against South Africa in New York
Miscellaneous Highlights: Close to 25,000 fans filled the stands in New York for Moday's game
Bangladesh fans dominated the crowd at the 34,000-seater Nassau County Cricket Ground
Others: Tanzim Sakib's partner in crime on Monday was Taskin Ahmed
Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller stitched a 79-run stand for the 5th wicket -- a record for South Africa in men's T20 World Cup 2024
